business_definition: Group item containing header information for the daily transaction report including report names and date range
Short name identifier for the report (VALUE 'DALYREPT')
Long descriptive name of the report (VALUE 'Daily Transaction Report')
Label text for the date range section (VALUE 'Date Range: ')
Starting date of the report period (VALUE SPACES)

Ending date of the report period (VALUE SPACES)
